Posts.Content: Hello-I just had a chest CT w/ contrast, and the result said that I have "a prominent no. of subcentimeter lymph nodes in the axilla, superior mediastium and lower neck". Does anyone have an idea of what this means? I haven't found anything other than articles on Breast Cancer and Lymphoma. Any thoughts on lymph nodes in the neck, chest and arm pit areas? Thanks, Lorie
Posts.Title: need info. re. lymph nodes

Posts.Content: Thank you for answering my question. I will be going in for a 2nd CT scan, in 1 more month and will let you know what comes of it. I am praying it was and infection or inflammation from something minor. I will keep you posted. Lorie
Posts.Title: need info. re. lymph nodes
